title: Lux needs nerf srsly
body:
Its unfucking fair. That unkillable squishy unlimited shielding fucker who nukes everyone on the team gets to rule solo queue.
You cant assassinate even with zed because of her bullshit cc which blows everyone on the team up
I lost to one with Fucking warlords bloodlust
You cant dodge E because its so fucking unseeable
The q should be and ult on itself
Talking about the ult - not goign to fucking talk about it
Thunderlords adds more salt
Shield thats stops ignite should be replacable for barrier 
Range is longer than my dick ( pretty long)
Teamfight noob
Anti assassin

PLS NERF THE FUCK OUT OF LUX
Rito OCE wont ever understand 
because its oce

replies.body:
Cleanse/ zhonyas
Learn to dodge
If you cant see her e, you should fiddle with your visual settings, even on low I can usually see the hitbox clearly (In saying this, she was buffed a while ago so she can pre-detonate her E so it explodes as it reaches the place, and in that case you can't really see it).

Anyways, winning as lux vs zed isn't even that hard. Zed is melee, which you can quickly punish him and zone him from farming with your long range poke. most lux mains I know take barrier/heal/cleanse so that pretty much negates an underfarmed zed ultimate.

well, cc her back
or gank her
she is no the worse to deal with
Lux not really a OP champ beside her super short cds ult. and she only OP when you facing a Lux that hit every skill shot which rarely happen in low elo but if that happen which mean you unlucky.

Her E range has been disgusting for a long time but she's not that bad. It's easy to predict and if you move correctly you can dodge it. She doesn't have kill potential without her Q so just don't die to her and either feed off her or her teammates.
